physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Coarsened facial features, broadened nose, prominent ear cartilage, slightly enlarged testes (5 cc)
Overnight serial sampling of GH showed complete loss of pulsatility, with levels averaging 5.6 ng/mL
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: PRL levels declined after surgery by ~50%, but increased gradually thereafter to preoperative levels

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: IGF-I levels decreased to 9.9 nmol/L (76 ng/mL); spot GH levels decreased to less than 1 ng/mL; IGF-binding protein-3 levels remained normal (3.5 mg/L)
